# addObserver(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified object to the list of objects to notify when the picker configuration changes.

## Declaration

```swift
func addObserver(_ observer: any PKToolPickerObserver)
```

## Parameters

- **observer**: The object to notify when changes occur.

## Detecting changes to the picker

- **removeObserver(_:)**: Removes the specified object from the list of objects to notify when the picker configuration changes.
- **PKToolPickerObserver**: An interface you use to detect when the user changes the selected tools and drawing characteristics of a tool picker object.
